ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Health_Potion
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Heal [GetHealAmount] Health.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Large_Health_Potion
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Heal [GetHealAmount] Health.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Mana_Potion
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetManaAmount] Mana.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Large_Mana_Potion
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetManaAmount] Mana.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Rejuv_Elixir
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetHealthAmount] Health and [GetManaAmount] Mana.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Large_Rejuv_Elixir
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetHealthAmount] Health and [GetManaAmount] Mana.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_010
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Teleport yourself and your army to targeted friendly structure.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_020
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Place an observer ward that can reveal cloaked enemies. Can also reveal mines.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_030
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Selected ally flag cannot be captured by the enemy for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_040
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Decreases target's Attack Speed by [GetAttackSpeedReduction]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_050
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Increase Movement Speed by [GetMoveSpeedBonus]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_060
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Draws fire from towers of light when placed nearby.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_070
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Warp to a nearby location.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_080
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Heal an allied unit for [GetHealAmount] or damage an enemy unit for [GetDamageAmount].

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_090
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Any negative effects on your army are removed. The Demigod is not affected.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_100
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Weapon damage dealt by the targeted Demigod and their army reduced by [GetReduction]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_110
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Temporarily increase Maximum Health by [GetHealthBonus]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_120
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Your army restores [GetHealth]% of their maximum Health.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_130
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Cast a bolt of lightning at the target, dealing [GetHealth] damage and arcing to nearby enemies. Demigods struck also lose [GetMana] Mana.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_140
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: The cost of abilities is reduced by [GetReduction]% for [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_150
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Become invulnerable for [GetDuration] seconds. Cannot move, attack or use abilities.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_160
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetHealth] Health and [GetMana] Mana over [GetDuration] seconds. Any damage will break this effect.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_170
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Infest target Demigod with a parasite. Whenever you deal damage to that Demigod, their minions take damage as well. The effects lasts [GetDuration] seconds.

ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Heal [GetHealAmount] Health.

ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Heal [GetHealAmount] Health.

ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetManaAmount] Mana.

ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetManaAmount] Mana.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Rejuv_Elixir_Art
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetHealthAmount] Health and [GetManaAmount] Mana.

ItemBlueprint.Name: Item_Large_Rejuv_Elixir_Art
ItemBlueprint.Description: Use: Restore [GetHealthAmount] Health and [GetManaAmount] Mana.

BuffBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_150_Use
BuffBlueprint.Description: Invulnerable. Cannot move, attack or use abilities.

BuffBlueprint.Name: Item_Consumable_170_Use
BuffBlueprint.Description: Minions take damage when Parasite Egg's owner damages you.
